lead_paragraph: If living up to the adage, "if you can't say something nice about someone, don't say anything at all," was an Olympic event the United States men's basketball team would be standing atop the Rio Games podium on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Basketball : U.S. 'B Team' Kills Opponents With Kindness
headline.main: Basketball : U.S. 'B Team' Kills Opponents With Kindness
